profile_positions.description:
Presently as Technology Manager for Veon, I spearhead and control technology budget, strategy, business plans, and procurement procedures. I offer technical support to M&A teams for merger and acquisitions of mobile and/or fixed Telco operators, Tower companies, and Network sharing agreements.

Here is a list of my key projects and achievements:

■	Provided assistance to strategy and commercial teams for developing technology strategy of group for next 3 - 5 years through assessment of new technologies & trends and aligning them with Operations current status and future needs. Examples include:
o	Evolution to 5G
o	Open/Virtualized RAN
o	Core Network virtualization and Data Center consolidation
o	Fixed Mobile convergence
o	Small Cells & Heterogeneous Networks
o	Transport Network evolution to SDN & Network Slicing
o	Led the development of Vendor performance evaluation from a technical standpoint; taking in to account current vendors portfolio, and their future technology roadmaps fitting them to our operations needs and strategies.

■	Key project: Turn around program for Biggest OpCo
o	Transformed underperforming company in a record three-month time (as part of SWAT team) by working with operations and technical Network engineers, Strategy, Commercial & marketing teams, customer relations, quality department, and C-level management through daily reporting, gap analysis, critical fixes, and appropriate recommendations.
o	Drafted key procedures for the local teams covering Network Capacity Management; managed Service Provider performance evaluation blueprint, Network Utilization monthly monitoring and gating process for new network functionalities and features implementation.
o	Achieved the following:
•	Reduced problematic sites by half 
•	Enhanced quality of network for voice and data, NPS improved by two folds
•	Expedited implementation of key strategic projects (Voice over LTE subscribers up from 0 to 300k in 2 months)

profile_positions.description:
From 2015 to 2017, I was Technology Senior Manager at Vimpelcom (now Veon).

I was part of the: Technology Structural Efficiencies Team, specializing in CAPEX/OPEX optimization, Budget Reviews, Business Planning, Group Tendering and ad-hoc projects (M&A’s, Performance benchmarking).

I offered technical expertise to tendering and procurement processes across all network domains (RAN, Transport, Core). I also drafted technical annexes for group tenders and RFPs, arranged clarification workshops, evaluated and benchmarked supplier proposals, and calculated TCO & associated costs. 

Furthermore, I supported Regulatory and GR teams in currently owned & new spectrum acquisitions. Developing Business cases, performing technical evaluations, answering RFPs issued by regulators in different countries, providing feedback and defining optimal usage of acquired spectrum were also a part of my job duties. 

I performed ad-hoc work daily, providing technical expertise to Radio Access and Transport Networks. My tasks included: trial run for new solutions and equipment, contents assessment of Purchase Orders, market research for non-conventional suppliers and alignment with company’s Vendor portfolio. 

Key Achievement:
■	Decreased Capex to Revenue ratio from 21% to 16% over 5 years, by prioritizing top projects in the operations, optimizing expenditure, maximizing OpCos profitability, and financial KPIs by efficiently managing CAPEX/OPEX performance through project based deep diving.
